item.name: Umber-ella
entries: A seemingly normal unbrella made of black fabric with a polished white handle. When opened and held by a creatue with {@b {@i Sunlight Sensitivity}}, the shde created by the Umber-ella is not treated as sunlight.

item.name: Cheezer Longitudinal Universal Budger MK. 2
item.reqAttune: a member of the Cheezer Family
entries: The lineage of the Cheezer house is forged into this iron rectangle. Long ago Warlton Ulysses Cheezer IV artisinally crafted this weapon to challenge his cousin,  Warlton Robert Cheezer, to a game of the golf to settle their family disputes (As is tradition)
The C.L.U.B has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. You can use expend one charge to cast {@spell catapault} (DC 14).

item.name: Blackwood Account of the Occult
entries: Before his death, Cassiel Blackwood used the access afforded by his wifeâ€™s station to research the odd and occult. Many notes in the book are hidden behind codes and ciphers to prevent his findings from becoming public.
The book seems to almost bend space and time, adding more pages when you seem to get to the end and can be used as a spell book

This book has a number of charges equal to our proficiency bonus. You can use expend one charge to cast {@spell hellish rebuke|PHB} at second level using your spell save DC. It regains all charges at dawn.

item.name: Infinite Sketchbook
entries: A leatherbouind sketchbook that seems to almost bend space and time, adding more pages when you seem to get to the end and can be used as a spell book.
While attuned to this book, you can can channel your artistic nature and cast {@spell color spray|PHB} at first level at will.
This book has a number of charges equal to your the half your character level - 1. It regains all charges at dawn.

This book can also case doodles and musings to come to life. You can use expend the listed charges to cast one of the following spells using your spell DC and ability modifier. A spell can be cast at a higher lever using an additional charge per level.

rows: {@spell summon fey|TCE}, {@spell summon shadowspawn|TCE}, {@spell summon undead|TCE}
{@spell summon aberration|TCE}, {@spell summon construct|TCE}, {@spell summon elemental|TCE}

item.name: Kaliedescope of Revealing
entries: A seemingly normal wooden rod with a lens at both ends. When looking through this rod the viewer is treated to a wonderous display of colors and shapes designed to delight and dazzle.
When an attuned creature looks through this device, they are treated to the same, but when viewing a creature or object altered but Illusion Magic, they appear as they would normally.
